articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Rohit Sharma won 5 IPL titles, many didn’t even win once’: Gautam Gambhir praises India captain after Asia Cup title win - The Indian Express
articles.description: Gautam Gambhir also warned that if India do not win the World Cup in 2023, then questions will be raised on Rohit's captaincy.
articles.content: India lifted the Asia Cup after beating defending champions Sri Lanka in the final on Sunday.Mohammed Siraj starred with a career-best 6/21 as the Rohit Sharma-led India romped home to a target of 51… [+1465 chars]
